div.p: Nowell students: welcome to the fourth quarter of the 2019-2020 school year!

Our school schedule for this quarter is different than it has been in the past. Starting on Monday, April 20th, we have a virtual Arts Exploration week with AS220. These classes will meet from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Please find the links to these classes below.

Starting Tuesday April 28th, you will be responsible to attend both project 1 and project 2 each day. Please check your daily schedule in your email to know where to go first! You can also find the schedule for your grade here:
9th Grade Schedule | 10th Grade Schedule | 11th Grade Schedule | 12th Grade Schedule
Please remember that you are responsible for taking your own attendance each day using the link below. On the attendance form, make sure to describe the work you accomplished each day.
Questions? Call or text your mentor or Melissa Slaiger at 401-578-4177.
You can still access free breakfast and lunch. Click here for a link of food pick-up locations.
Looking to access your teacher’s Zoom Room during office hours? Click here for the links to every teacher’s room.
